COMMENT_TX: Debut for umpires Scott McDougall, Shawn Kimball, Jeff Evans and Pete DeFlesco, who worked because the staff umpires were not working due to contract negotiations which stalled during spring training; the contract was settled but the assigned umpires could not get to Baltimore in time to work the game

ej,oatej101,M,mckej901,Fair/foul call (Reversed; threw cap) $Chris Hoiles chopped the ball down the 3B line; Robin Ventura fielded the ball, tagged Randy Milligan and threw to 1B; 3B umpire Jim McKean ruled that the ball was foul but HP umpire Vic Voltaggio overruled McKean and reversed the call to fair; McKean then signalled Millgan out, saying that Ventura tagged Milligan before the later could get back to 3B; Orioles manager Johnny Oates threw a tantrum, including stomping around and throwing his cap; Oates ejected by McKean
